name: Another F***ing Zombie Game
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE MADE FOR THE AINT152 MODULE AT PLYMOUTH UNIVERSITY!

Backstory:

In the year 2XXX, Zombies have taken over the world and has killed everyone in their path. Except for a small group of survivalists who have managed to survive for decades against the Zombie swarm. You play as August Dangerfield, one of the most deadliest soldiers in the world, who’s ready to take back the world from the wretched zombie scum, one bullet after another.

Controls:

  • W - Up
  • S - Down
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • Cursor - Look Around
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Shift - Sprint
  • 1 - Dual Pistols
  • 2 - Rifle
  • 3 - Crossbow
  • 4 - Shotgun
